name: getgeneration
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dream_diffusion.
Tool description: Train Stable Diffusion models in 8 minutes and generate custom images.
API description: Fetches the generation status and generated images from the Dream Diffusion API.

x_api_key.description: The API key required for authorization to access the generation data.

generation_uuid.description: The unique identifier for the generation process.
